wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Harold "Tug" Wilson (23 November 1917 – 1959) was an English professional footballer. He played for Gillingham between 1936 and 1949.

response: *Tug Wilson (footballer) (Thomas Harold "Tom" Wilson, 1917–1959), Gillingham F.C. player of the 1930s and 1940s
